articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Machine Plant
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the machine plant managed by O Mun Hyon dashing ahead like the wind to significantly greet the great festival in October.
					 After going round the production processes, he saw the latest machines newly produced by the plant and learned in detail about the production there. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers there brought about a signal boost in the manufacture of machines by putting the production processes on a modern and scientific basis and actively developing and introducing new technology into production.
					
					 It is a great success that the workers of the plant manufactured latest machines in a short span of time by their own efforts and with their own technology, he said, extending high appreciation and thanks to them for performing such an admirable feat as preparing an excellent gift to be dedicated to the 65th anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 Noting that the workers are now successfully manufacturing any latest machine if they have a will to do, he added that this stirring reality strikingly demonstrates the might of the independent Juche-oriented industry built by them with much effort, tightening their belts.
					
					 He stressed that the 65th founding anniversary of the WPK marks a significant occasion in glorifying the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed for the Party building, the revolutionary cause of Juche and the human cause of independence and demonstrating the high national stamina of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK and their mettle to win sure victory in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation, single-mindedly united around the party.
					
					 Noting that the country is now alive with the dynamic advance of all the servicepersons and people towards the great festival in October, he once again ardently called on all sectors and units to bring about a great leap forward and thus make the fireworks of victory and great joy gorgeously decorate the sky in auspicious October. 
					
					 He advanced important tasks to be fulfilled by the plant. 
					
					 Expressing great expectation and conviction that the workers of the plant would creditably play their role as vanguard and a shock brigade in the great drive to build a thriving nation in the future, too, he had a photo session with labor innovators of the plant. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK and  Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Je Gang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Je Gang
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Thursday sent a wreath to the bier of Ri Je Gang, first vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: FM Slams Israel's Military Attack on Freedom Flotilla
articles.content:
FM Slams Israel's Military Attack on Freedom Flotilla
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA on Thursday as regards the military attack mounted by Israel on the flotilla of humanitarian aid boats heading for Palestine:
					 On May 31 the Israeli navy mounted an indiscriminate attack on a flotilla of boats for humanitarian aid to inhabitants in Gaza of Palestine by mobilizing three warships, armed helicopters and hundreds of commandoes in the international waters of the Mediterranean. It mercilessly killed or wounded dozens of civilians aboard the boats. The whole flotilla made up of six boats and at least 700 Palestinian solidarity activists was seized and taken to a port of Israel. 
					
					 The recent incident was a crime against humanity perpetrated at the U.S. connivance and under its patronage and a blatant challenge to the Arabs including Palestinians and the Mideast peace process.
					
					 The U.S., which is hell-bent on increasing the international pressure and tightening sanctions against the DPRK by fabricating the case of "Cheonan" warship, is feigning ignorance of the inhuman military action of Israel. This alone makes clear what is the U.S. policy standard on world peace and security.
					
					 The DPRK vehemently denounces the above-said brigandish acts of Israel and expresses full support and solidarity with the cause of the Palestinians and other Arab people.

articles.title: KCNA on Hatoyama's Miserable Fate
articles.content:
KCNA on Hatoyama's Miserable Fate
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Hatoyama resigned on Wednesday.
					 This was a stern judgment given by the Japanese people and history to him as he unhesitatingly betrayed the people's mindset and yielded to the U.S. to realize his political ambition.
					
					 As universally known, he emerged prime minister from the Democratic Party, putting an end to the long history of the Liberal Democratic Party's rule because he advocated "independence" in Japan's policy toward the U.S. and made an exceptional election promise to ensure that the U.S. forces base in Futenma is transferred to an area outside Okinawa Prefecture or outside the country as strongly demanded by the Japanese people including the inhabitants of the prefecture, in particular. 
					
					 The Japanese people expected him to put his promise into a reality and the international community followed with interest his attitude in the subsequent period. 
					
					 But Hatoyama betrayed them by reneging on his promise. 
					
					 As the coalition regime of the Democratic Party showed the sign of stability at its initial stage, he began backing from his "hard-line policy toward the U.S.", making eyes at it. 
					
					 Such tendency surfaced at the outset of the year as a cowardly behavior intended to stay in the premiership full time by clinging to the coattail of the U.S. 
					
					 During the election and right after the assumption of his office, he made much fuss in a bid to create the impression that he was breaking with Washington, trumpeting about importance to East Asia based on the "idea of fraternity" and the like. But the public gradually began hearing from him remarks that the "Japan-U.S. alliance is an axis of the Japan security policy" and a spate of other outbursts identical to the pro-U.S. one-sided policy pursued in the period of the LDP's rule.
					
					 Such about-turn of Hatoyama hinted at the fact that the DPJ might find itself in a political crisis any time while dithering without its own principle just to please the U.S.
					
					 When the U.S. became vociferous about "threat from north Korea," citing the case of the warship "Cheonan," Hatoyama met the U.S. demand over its military base in Futenma as if he had been waiting for this to happen.
					
					 Various parts of Japan were swept by waves of demonstrations and rallies demanding the resignation of Hatoyama as he behaved against the people's mindset, yielding to the pressure of the U.S. 
					
					 The Social-Democratic Party of Japan withdrew from the ruling coalition, and there increased the pressure from the opposition parties, forcing him to step down.
					
					 The political pitfall into which Hatoyama fell was, in fact, dug by the U.S. It made an utmost use of Hatoyama who posed a great threat to the U.S.-Japan alliance and the implementation of its Asia policy while asserting what he called "independence". But it compelled him to step down of his own accord in the end. 
					
					 In the final analysis, he was shot by bullets fired by two sides for having behaved without political independence and creed. 
					
					 Japan witnessed a frequent replacement of its prime ministers and its political situation was hardly rid of a whirlwind of ceaseless unrest in recent years. This is closely linked with the hostile policy pursued by the Japanese authorities toward the DPRK. 
					
					 Those prime ministers of Japan including Abe and Aso were compelled without exception to leave their offices before the end of their tenure as they were frantic with the moves to stifle the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and with militarism in pursuance of the U.S. hostile policy toward it. 
					
					 This is, by no means, fortuitous. It goes to prove that the hostile policies pursued by them were anachronistic ones going against the wishes of the Japanese people and the trend of history. 
					
					 Nevertheless, Hatoyama, lost to all sense of decency, so zealously toed the U.S. policy that he volunteered to act a servant of the south Korean puppet regime, lackeys of the U.S. 
					
					 After the outbreak of the case of "Cheonan" sinking he went the lengths of blustering that "Japan would take the lead in sponsoring a UN Security Council resolution" against the DPRK when requested by south Korea. This suffices to indicate that he had lost his qualification to remain a chief executive of the country. 
					
					 Pro-U.S. attitude and flunkeyism to it are not the way for Japan to follow. 
					
					 If one follows flunkeyism, one is bound to become an idiot and if a country takes to flunkeyism, it is bound to go to ruin.
					
					 Japan should not forget this truth of history.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Held to Condemn Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Held to Condemn Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in North and South Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces and Nampho City on Thursday to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea for their smear campaign against the DPRK. 
					 The rallies were attended by officials of local party and power bodies, social organizations, institutions at all levels, industrial establishments and farms as well as working people and youth and students.
					
					 Reporters and speakers there said that a touch-and-go situation in which a war may break out is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the moves of the south Korean conservative authorities and the U.S. and Japanese aggressors colluding with them.
					
					 The case of the sinking of warship was a sheer fabrication orchestrated by the group of traitors, they held, branding the group crying out for even international "sanctions" as the sworn enemy who turned their backs on the nation.
					
					 It is the spirit of the army and people of the DPRK to react to the enemy's provocation with resolute punishment, they said, expressing the firm will to smash the moves of the south Korean warmongers to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 They called upon all the officials, party members and other working people to keep themselves fully combat ready and display patriotic enthusiasm and creative ingenuity in carrying out their revolutionary duties and thus make positive contributions to accelerating the drive for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Qatari Emir Wishes for Stronger Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Qatari Emir Wishes for Stronger Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Sheikh Hamad Bin Khalifa Al-Thani, emir of the State of Qatar, on May 31 met and had a talk with the delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry participating in the "10th Doha Forum."
					 Saying that the relations between Qatar and the DPRK are favorably developing despite the complicated international environment, he hoped that these relations would grow strong in the future, too.

articles.title: Swedish National Day Marked
articles.content:
Swedish National Day Marked
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Mats Foyer, Swedish ambassador to the DPRK, arranged a reception at his embassy here on Thursday on the occasion of the national day of his country. 
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Jon Kuk Man, vice-minister of Education, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairperson of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairperson of the DPRK-Sweden Friendship Association, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Bulgarian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Bulgarian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Charge d'Affaires a.i. Vihren Nikolov and staff members of the Bulgarian embassy here did a friendly work on the DPRK-Bulgaria Friendship Samjigang Co-operative Farm in Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province, on Thursday.
					 The guests gave helping hands to the farmers and during a break, appreciated an art performance given by kindergarteners.
					
					 They handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Chairman of Intl Kim Il Sung Foundation Here
articles.content:
Chairman of Intl Kim Il Sung Foundation Here
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, arrived here Thursday by air.

articles.title: DPRK Succeeds in Asian Women's Boxing Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Succeeds in Asian Women's Boxing Championships
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The DPRK players bagged two gold medals, four silver medals and two bronze medals at the Fifth Asian Women's Boxing Championships held in Kazakhstan from May 23 to 30.
					 Kim Myong Sim came first in the 48kg category and Yun Kum Ju in the 57kg category.
					
					 Jong Ok, Kim Hye Song, Ryu Yong Sim and Ri Suk Yong placed second in the 46kg, 54kg, 60kg and 69kg categories and Pak Kyong Ok and Jang Un Hui third in the 64kg and 75kg categories.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Opens
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The sports contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize was opened with due ceremony at the Hyesan Stadium in Ryanggang Province on Thursday.
					 During the contest, competitions will be made in football, basketball, volleyball, marathon and other events in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Pyon Chol Su, vice-chairman of the Korean Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, in his opening speech underlined the need for all the sportspersons to fully display the technique they have cultivated in their day-to-day training to prove successful in every event and thus contribute to further developing the sports of the country.

articles.title: High Protein Feed Produced
articles.content:
High Protein Feed Produced
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Two species of protein insects have been raised in abundance in Sinhung County, South Hamgyong Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 It is possible to raise them easily and rapidly in any place at low cost.
					
					 One of them contains more than 70 percent of protein, vitamins, fatty matters and other substances good for such domestic animals as chicken, duck, pig and goat.   
					
					 The other, with more than 60 percent of protein and essential amino acids, is suitable for fries. 
					
					 Excrements of the insects are also used as fish feed.
					
					 The fatting rate of fish fed with them doubles what it was before.

articles.title: Hostile Forces' Brigandish Accusations against "Nuclear Issue"
articles.content:
Hostile Forces' Brigandish Accusations against "Nuclear Issue"
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The United States and some other hostile forces, speaking at the NPT Review Conference, again took issue with the DPRK's withdrawal from the NPT, blustering that it failed to properly honor the provisions of the NPT and it should be pressurized to pay for its violation of the treaty and the like. They were, at the same time, busy spreading assertion that the DPRK should not be recognized as a nuclear weapons state and that it should dismantle its nuclear weapons and return to the treaty. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					This cannot be construed otherwise than a deliberate act of misrepresenting the situation in disregard of the reality. Their ulterior intention is to brand the DPRK as "a nuclear criminal" in a bid to justify their reckless campaign against it and achieve their sinister purpose. 
					
					 The commentary cites facts that their accusations against the DPRK over its pullout of the treaty and its access to nuclear weapons are nothing but nonsensical piffles ignoring the root cause of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and the historical background against which it surfaced there. 
					
					 It was the U.S. that compelled the DPRK to pull out of the treaty and have access to nuclear weapons, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 As far as the violation of the treaty, nuclear arms race and nuclear proliferation are concerned, the U.S. is wholly to blame for them. 
					
					 The U.S. is the world's biggest possessor of nuclear weapons and their delivery means. 
					
					 It is the arch criminal disturbing the worldwide nuclear non-proliferation regime by applying its double standards to the nuclear issue.
					
					 The U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK have created such dangerous situation on the peninsula that a nuclear war may break out any moment. 
					
					 If the peninsula is to be denuclearized, the U.S. should defuse its nuclear threat to the DPRK and roll back its hostile policy toward the latter. Herein lies the key to finding a solution to the issue.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to fulfil its commitments, bearing this deep in mind, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Joint Anti-Submarine Maneuver Kicked off in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Anti-Submarine Maneuver Kicked off in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces announced they would kick off a joint anti-submarine maneuver in waters of the West Sea of Korea on June 8, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 It was reported that the maneuver would involve huge forces including super-large nuclear-powered carrier "George Washington" belonging to the 7th fleet of the U.S. imperialists, Aegis destroyers and nuclear-powered submarines.
					
					 The warmongers openly disclosed their scenario to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, blustering that their action taken to move up the date for the start of the maneuver to the beginning of June from late in the month would serve what they said "a strong message to the north" and "a warning to it".

articles.title: Opening of Information about Warship to Public Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Opening of Information about Warship to Public Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Bar Association for Democratic Society in south Korea jointly called a press conference on May 31, urging the puppet defense ministry to open the information about the case of warship "Cheonan" to the public, according to south Korea's KBS.
					 Noting that the military authorities have not opened to the public key information about the case including the navigation and communications records at the time of "Cheonan" sinking under the pretext of "military secret", arousing lots of doubts, the organizations demanded that the military authorities open to the public all the data helpful to probing the truth behind the case.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand on Warship Sinking Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand on Warship Sinking Supported
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The French Revolutionary Communist League issued a statement on May 25 accusing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK smear campaign after its fabrication of the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking.
					 The statement noted that the situation on the Korean Peninsula reached the worst state on the brink of a war as the south Korean authorities groundlessly took issue with the DPRK after faking up misinformation.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation on the Korean Peninsula, the league vehemently denounces the south Korean authorities, the U.S. and its following forces for their anti-DPRK smear campaign and extends firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to exercise their legitimate right to self-defense to protect their sovereignty, the statement said.
					
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain also released a statement on May 24 in support of the statements made public by the spokesmen for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Foreign Ministry and the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					
					 Saying that the warship sinking was a farce deliberately orchestrated by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to deteriorate the situation, the statement demanded that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique immediately roll back the hostile policy towards the DPRK and conduct a thorough-going investigation into the case.
					
					 The British government and media, too, called for refraining from encouraging the U.S. and the south Korean authorities in their anti-DPRK smear campaign, fully supporting the just stand of the DPRK on the case.
					
					 On the same day, Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, in the statement issued on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration charged that the case of warship sinking is nothing but a trickery aimed to further strengthen the foundation of the south Korean ruling forces and legalize the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea by creating a new crisis on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Struggle Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Struggle Supported
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party took place in Prague on May 27 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Miroslav Stepan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said at the meeting that Kim Jong Il has successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist state while working at the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Under his leadership the DPRK has firmly established the political and ideological unity and cohesion between the party and the people and increased the nation's defence capability in every way while steadfastly preserving the principles of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence, the speaker stressed.
					
					 The case of warship "Cheonan", orchestrated by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities as part of their anti-DPRK smear campaign, rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula so dangerous that a war may break out there once again, he said, and went on:
					
					 They have asserted that the DPRK was involved in the case. As a matter of course they should have investigated it with the representative of the DPRK involved, had their claim been true.
					
					 But they not only prevented the DPRK's representative from joining the "investigation team" but also refused the latter's proposal that it would send its inspection group for the probe into the warship sinking.
					
					 We urge the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to accept the DPRK's proposal.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party expresses support and solidarity with the friendly Korean people in their struggle to defend peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Lauded
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Humberto Vargas Carbonel, general secretary of the People's Vanguard of Costa Rica, issued a statement on May 25 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il has developed the WPK, founded by President Kim Il Sung, into a mother party both in name and reality over the past 40 years, thus performing exploits which would shine for all ages.
					
					 He put forward such slogans as "We serve the people!" and "Let the whole Party go among the masses!" and has made the Party a guide which leads the people to the bright future while sharing joys and sorrows with them with responsibility for their destiny, it said.
					
					 He set out a grand goal to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation till 2012 and has led the movement for general advance of the Korean people to attain it, the statement stressed, adding that the WPK, under his leadership, would make steady progress as a mother party serving the people.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- One day in January Juche 85 (1996) General Secretary Kim Jong Il met visiting Japan-resident Korean students.
					 During the conversation, he asked them if there was anyone who came from Hyogo Prefecture.
					
					 A teacher answered that a student came from the prefecture.
					
					 Kim Jong Il asked again what damage the student's family suffered in the 1995 great Hanshin earthquake.
					
					 He lost his mother, the teacher answered.
					
					 The leader asked the student about his name, age and his family circumstances.
					
					 The student barely managed to answer to his questions, sorrow welling up within him.
					
					 Feeling sorry about his grief, Kim Jong Il told the student in a tearful voice that though he lost his mother, he would never be alone under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea and the fatherland.
					
					 The student burst into tears, deeply affected by his kind words of consolation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Ri Je Gang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Ri Je Gang
						
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 3 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Ri Je Gang, primer subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: MINREX condena ataque de Israel contra barcos de ayuda humanitaria
articles.content:
MINREX condena ataque de Israel contra barcos de ayuda humanitaria
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con que Israel lanzo el ataque militar contra los barcos pacificos que transportaban los suministros humanitarios a Palestina, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 3 como sigue:
					  El 31 de mayo, las fuerzas maritimas de Israel atacaron indiscriminadamente en alta mar del Mediterraneo la flotilla de asistencia humanitaria, que navegaba con materiales de socorro para los habitantes de la region de Gaza de Palestina, movilizando tres buques de guerra, helicopteros militares y centenares de comandos.
					
					 Como resultado, decenas de civiles a bordo fueron asesinados y lesionados cruelmente y la flotilla entera, compuesta de seis barcos y mas de 700 activistas pro-palestinos, fue atrapada y llevada al puerto de Israel. 
					
					El presente caso es un crimen antietico cometido bajo la tacita tolerancia y el amparo de EE.UU. y un desafio abierto al pueblo palestino y los demas arabes y al proceso de paz del Medio Oriente.
					
					EE.UU., que actua demencialmente para presionar y sancionar a escala mundial a la RPDC pretextando el inventado caso de hundimiento del buque surcoreano "Cheonan", se hace el sueco de esa operacion militar inhumana de Israel. Esto muestra evidentemente como es la pauta politica de EE.UU. sobre la paz y la seguridad del mundo. 
					
					Denunciamos categoricamente el bandidaje de Israel y expresamos nuestro irrestricto apoyo y solidaridad con la causa de los pueblos arabes, incluso el palestino.

articles.title: ATCC comenta la renuncia de Hatoyama
articles.content:
ATCC comenta la renuncia de Hatoyama
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- El dia 2, renuncio a su cargo el premier japones Hatoyama.
					  Esto significa la severa sentencia del pueblo japones y la historia a el quien para realizar su ambicion politica, traiciono sin vacilacion al pueblo capitulando ante Estados Unidos.
					
					  Como ya esta conocido, Hatoyama pudo ser el primer ministro por el Partido Democratico poniendo fin a la larga historia de mandato del Partido Democratico Liberal gracias a sus promesas electorales sensacionales como mantener la "independencia" en la politica sobre EE.UU. y trasladar a las afueras del departamento de Okinawa o del pais la base de las tropas norteamericanas de Futenma como lo demandan fuertemente el pueblo japones incluyendo los moradores de ese departamento. 
					
					  El pueblo japones espero que se pusieran en practica sus promesas y la sociedad internacional lo observaba tambien con mucha atencion.
					
					  Pero, Hatoyama respondio con engano y traicion.
					
					  Al ver que se estabilizaba elementalmente el poder de la coalicion del Partido Democratico, el comenzo a retroceder de su "posicion intransigente" hacia EE.UU. mostrando gestos adulatorios a este imperio.
					
					  Esta vil tendencia encaminada a completar su mandato al abrigo de EE.UU. se hizo mas palpable en este ano.
					
					  Durante las elecciones y al principio de su mandato, el hablaba tanto de conceder la importancia a Asia Oriental basada en el "ideal de fraternidad" y otras cosas como si quisiera apartarse de EE.UU. Pero, salieron poco a poco de su boca las palabras, que consuenan con la politica de favoritismo a EE.UU. practicada en el regimen del Partido Democratico Liberal, tales como "la alianza Japon-EE.UU. es el eje de la politica de seguridad de Japon".
					
					  Este cambio de su actitud insinuaba que era una cuestion de tiempo la caida del Partido Democratico en la crisis politica por adular a EE.UU. actuando sin su propio criterio. 
					
					  Cuando el imperio preconizaba la "teoria de la amenaza del Norte de Corea" bajo el pretexto del intrigante caso del buque de guerra "Cheonan", Hatoyama aprovecho esta oportunidad para aceptar la demanda de EE.UU. en el problema de traslado de la base de Futenma.
					
					  En todas partes de Japon se desataron las manifestaciones y mitines en demanda de la renuncia del premier que dio espaldas a la opinion publica doblegandose ante la presion de EE.UU.
					
					  El Partido Democratico Social se retiro del poder de coalicion y se fortalecio mas la presion del partido en oposicion a Hatoyama que se vio obligado a declarar su renuncia. 
					
					    La ruina politica de Hatoyama se debio por otra parte a la trampa armada por EE.UU.
					
					  Tras sacar todos los provechos posibles de Hatoyama, el imperio propicio la renuncia de el que habia creado seria amenaza a la alianza EE.UU.-Japon y al cumplimiento de la politica norteamericana sobre Asia hablando de la supuesta "independencia". 
					
					  El fue castigado asi por dentro y por fuera.
					
					   En los ultimos anos, en Japon se han cambiado con frecuencia los premieres y la situacion politica del pais se halla en la voragine de desestabilizacion, lo cual esta relacionado estrechamente con la politica sobre Corea de las autoridades japonesas. 
					
					  Abe, Aso y otros premieres, que se aferraban al militarismo y a las maniobras de aplastamiento anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon en adhesion a la politica estadounidense de hostilidad a Corea, tuvieron sin excepcion el mandato corto. 
					
					Esto no es nada casual, sino comprueba que la politica hostil a Corea es la anacronica que contraviene a la demanda del pueblo japones y a la corriente de la historia. 
					
					Sin embargo, Hatoyama, que perseguia a ciegas a EE.UU., cumplio hasta el papel de sirviente de los titeres surcoreanos, lacayos de EE.UU., sin ningun sentido de orgullo y honor.
					
					  El dijo que si el Sur de Corea solicita una resolucion anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en cuanto al incidente de hundimiento del buque "Cheonan", "Japon debe esforzarse en la delantera por conseguirla". Ese dicho basta para saber que el ya ha perdido la calificacion de maximo gobernante del pais llamado Japon.
					
					  El servilismo a EE.UU. no es la opcion de Japon.
					
					  El servilismo a grandes potencias convierte a una persona en un idiota, y a un pais, lo lleva al arruinamiento. 
					
					  Japon no debe olvidar esta verdad de la historia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. en el "problema nuclear"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. en el "problema nuclear"
						
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- En la conferencia del cumplimiento del Tratado de No Proliferacion (TNP), Estados Unidos y otras fuerzas hostiles volvieron a censurar la retirada del TNP de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea insistiendo en que esta no cumplio debidamente el reglamento del tratado y hay que obligarla a pagar la violacion del tratado.
					  Tambien, circularon el rumor de que no deben reconocer a la RPDC como pais poseedor de armas nucleares y esta ha de volver al TNP renunciando a estos artefactos.
					
					  Esto deviene un acto premeditado para invertir la situacion despreciando la realidad.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 3 y continua:
					
					  Ellos intentan tildar a toda costa a la RPDC de "criminal nuclear" para justificar sus alborotos contra esta y alcanzar su malsano objetivo.
					
					  Censurar la retirada del TNP y la posesion de armas nucleares por parte de la RPDC deviene un disparate que parte de la ignorancia de la causa del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y su proceso historico.
					
					  EE.UU. es el que empujo a la RPDC a la retirada del tratado y a la posesion de armas nucleares.
					
					  Tambien, es el violador del tratado y culpable de la carrera armamentista y proliferacion nucleares.
					
					  Ademas, el imperio es el que posee la mayor cantidad de armas nucleares y medios de su transporte en el mundo.
					
					  EE.UU. destruye el sistema de no proliferacion nuclear a escala mundial aplicando la pauta de doble rasero en el problema nuclear.
					
					  La Peninsula Coreana esta en la situacion tan peligrosa que puede dar lugar a la guerra nuclear en cualquier momento debido a EE.UU. que trata de aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					  La solucion del problema, o sea, la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta en poner fin a la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y a su politica hostil a Corea.
					
					  EE.UU. debe saberlo bien y cumplir lo que le toca hacer.

articles.title: Entidades extranjeras apoyan la posicion de RPDC sobre "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Entidades extranjeras apoyan la posicion de RPDC sobre "Cheonan"
						
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- La Liga Comunista Revolucionaria de Francia publico el 25 de mayo una declaracion condenando a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que recurre a la campana anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tras inventar el incidente de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan".
					La nota senala que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta en la peor fase a punto de guerra debido a las autoridades surcoreanas que acusaron injustamente a la RPDC con datos manipulados.
					
					Destaca que frente a tal situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, la Liga Comunista Revolucionaria de Francia condena energicamente la campana intrigante de las autoridades surcoreanas, EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites y envia el firme apoyo y solidaridad al pueblo coreano decidido a ejercer su legitimo derecho a la autodefensa para defender la soberania.
					
					La sucursal de Gran Bretana de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea con sede en Espana publico el 24 de mayo con el fin de apoyar las declaraciones de los portavoces del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria.
					
					El hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan" es un complot malintencionado de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas para agravar la situacion, senala la nota y demanda a ellos que cesen de inmediato las acciones hostiles a la RPDC e investiguen correctamente el incidente.
					
					Anade que el gobierno britanico y los medios de prensa no deben incurrir en acciones que azucen la campana anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas contra la RPDC y expreso el apoyo total a la justa posicion de Corea sobre el incidente.
					
					En su declaracion publicada el mismo dia con motivo del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio, el presidente de la Asociacion Finlandia-Corea, Antti Sika Aho, senalo que el incidente del "Cheonan" no pasa de ser un maquiavelismo de las fuerzas gobernantes del Sur de Corea para ampliar el terreno de su dominacion y justificar la estancia de las tropas norteamericanas en suelo surcoreano creando la nueva crisis en la Peninsula Coreana.
